title: Sell Chateau Ausone
metaDescription: Sell your Chateau Ausone. We buy this rare Saint-Emilion Premier Grand Cru Classe A wine. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy the rare production of Chateau Ausone.
introParagraph: Chateau Ausone produces fewer than 2,000 cases a year, making it one of the rarest Bordeaux wines. We purchase Ausone and its second wine, Chapelle d'Ausone. If you possess this gem of Saint-Emilion, we offer a discreet and secure way to sell.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bottles with illegible labels (unless provenance is perfect)
pricingFactors: Scarcity (production is tiny compared to other First Growths)

faqs.question: Why is Ausone so expensive?
faqs.answer: It combines exceptional quality with extremely low production—roughly 1/10th the volume of Lafite.

faqs.question: Do you buy Chapelle d'Ausone?
faqs.answer: Yes, the second wine is also highly collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy Angelus or Pavie?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy other Premier Grand Cru Classé A wines from Saint-Emilion.

faqs.question: How do I ship valuable bottles?
faqs.answer: We provide prepaid labels and, for high-value collections, can arrange specialized temperature-controlled transport.

faqs.question: Do you buy vintage Ausone?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy vintage Ausone from the 20th century.

faqs.question: How quickly do I get a quote?
